members.signatureBeforeChange: private boolean shouldUpdate(KeyStroke ks, Action a)
members.signatureAfterChange: private boolean shouldUpdate(KeyStroke ks, Action a)
diff: -      // this key is already assigned to the same action, do nothing
+      // this key is already assigned to the same action; no action necessary, but updating doesn't hurt either
+      // and a gratuitous update simplifies dealing with multiple menu bars
+     * this function needs to be phased out altogether.
+     * the goal is for the OpenDefinitionsDocument to also function as its own Document,
+     * so this function will be useless
